name: Poker Squares (Original Edition)
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents: Poker Squares (Original Edition)!

Poker Squares is a solitaire card game where the object is to arrange the 25 randomly drawn cards on a 5x5 matrix in order to get the best possible poker hands...  both horizontally and vertically.  

The game requires a Tandy Color Computer 1, 2 or 3 with 64K of RAM or more.  It is a mix of BASIC and assembly language graphics routines running in PMODE4 (256x192 resolution) utilizing the CoCo's artifact colors. 

To run the game, type RUN "RUNME" and press ENTER.  

To play, move the cursor using the arrow keys, and place a card using the spacebar.
